item.title: Deploying OpenFaas on Docker Swarm
item.description: In this blog post, I am going to talk about how to deploy OpenFaas on Docker Swarm. OpenFaaS (Functions as a Service) is a framework for building serverless functions with Docker and Kubernetes. To know more about OpenFaas visit this link. I have already setup a two node Docker Swarm cluster running on cloud service provider Civo. OpenFaas repository contains a script deploy_stack.sh which can be used to deploy OpenFaas stack.
